A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I'm sad that this director gets another whole trilogy to direct. The opening lines between Poe and Hux were ridiculously stupid. This set the tone for the rest of this movie that turned out to be silly and unbelievable within a Star Wars universe. The Star Wars galaxy\, planets\, and systems seem to not exist in this film. Finn's plot does not change the story line. Not a good movie for fans.
